content.question: Taken together, the two documents best support the conclusion that Native Australians

choices.label: sought the right to vote as a way to more fully integrate into Australian society
used political activism to draw attention to their social and economic plight
launched a struggle for political independence based on ethnic nationalist ideas
practiced syncretic religions, blending elements of Christianity with native traditions

content.answer: used political activism to draw attention to their social and economic plight

topic.text: 6.3: Indigenous Responses to State Expansion from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
